desc: Squi.Jig is a Framing Jig made for builders, by builders. Commonly used as a framing square attachment for framing homes, metal fab and welding, and many other uses. The tall profile and various attachment options, make this tool useful in so many ways.

layout.text:
Made by tradesman, for tradesman. These Squi.Jigs are WAY more than stair gauges; commonly used for stair layout, rafter layout, as a rip guide on your saw, and more! Whether you're working with wood or metal. We have the jigs for you!!
Proudly MADE IN THE USA.
